name: Clic
description:
Clic is an exploration and photography game. Explore a new planet and document your findings in your Journal!

The team:

Designer:
- Merve Soylu
- Luke Territ
- Rhiannon Forster

Programmers:
- Matthew Jackson
- Max Atkinson

Artists:
- Rebekah Ure
- Abbey Shirreff
- Declan Boyd
- Eloise Menegol
- Emily Taylor
- Hayley Jacka
- Onorina Pachi

This game was completed by students at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment as our End of Year Project.
